com.tictactoe.gameelements

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tictactoe.gameelements.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a game board that contains a mxn grid of cells
    Author:
    arjunb

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameBoard(int rowsInBoard, int columnsInBoard)
      This is the constructor of the class which initializes the grid with EMPTY cells

      • isWinningState

        public boolean isWinningState(Player currentPlayer,
                              int k)
        This method finds out whether the current state of the board results in a victory for the player
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - Player who has made the last move
        k - The number of contiguous markers needed for victory
        Returns:
        True if the last move results in a victory else false

      • isDrawnState

        public boolean isDrawnState(Player currentPlayer,
                            int k)
        This method finds out if the current state of the board results in a drawn match
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who made the last move
        k - The number of contiguous markers needed for victory
        Returns:
        True if game reults in a draw else false

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver(Player currentPlayer,
                          int k)
        This is a wrapper method for the winning state and drawn state methods
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - The player who made the last move
        k - The number of contiguous markers needed for victory
        Returns:
        True if current state results in a win or a draw else false
